markdownRemark.html: More than "œlip service" perhaps "“ an empirical approach to the usage of the "œbest" authors almost amounts to a quest for new "œrules" that one could present in a grammar of the best authors. While someone like Valla provides description, it is presented in such a way as to amount to prescription.
